adrFormatAddress: 340 Madison Avenue ste4C, New York, NY 10173, USA

originalText.text: Going to the dentist was always a “hold your breathe” moment. Until I met Dr. Skordeles. Now I actually enjoy going to the dentist lol  The office environment is comfortable and friendly. And Dr. Skordeles is at the top of the dental game with regards to knowledge, skill, and the utilization of the most futuristic, state of the art tools in the industry. I know I can trust her to not try and hustle me like other dentists have in the past. And she’s done wonders for my teeth and overall dental health! Seriously, her work combined with the state of the art tools that she uses make cleanings, fillings etc an easy, pain free experience. No more walking out of the dentist office feeling like a truck ran through my face. My smile shines, and I haven’t had a cavity in over 5 years! People constantly ask who my dentist is, which in turn just makes me smile even more :-D I reply Dr. Skordeles, the best dentist you could ask for.

originalText.text: I have been with Dr. Skordeles for over twenty years now. Her quality, excellence and above all care for her patients is unsurpassed! I cannot recommend her enough. She is excellent beyond compare. She literally cares for every tooth! There are so terribly few like her these days. I so cannot recommend her enough!

text.text: I have been with Dr. Skordeles for over twenty years now. Her quality, excellence and above all care for her patients is unsurpassed! I cannot recommend her enough. She is excellent beyond compare. She literally cares for every tooth! There are so terribly few like her these days. I so cannot recommend her enough!

originalText.text:
WITHOUT DOUBT THE BEST MEDICAL SERVICE I HAVE EVER RECEIVED.

To begin, I firstly visited Dr Skordeles after being referred to by a friend at work. As an Irish immigrant living abroad it is very difficult to find trustworthy dental care without insurance. My friend spoke so highly of Dr Skordeles and my goodness was he right. Dr Skordeles has completely rid me of my fear of the dentist and needles in particular. The way in which she puts her patients at ease is second to none and you genuinely cannot even feel her injections.

Outside of this, Dr Skordeles is beyond reasonable in her pricing. For those of us with no insurance, please contact her and enquire re pricing as she does some great deals for her patients.

To date, Dr Skordeles has performed a dental examination and cleaning, two fillings, one root canal and one crown. I have never felt as comfortable getting work done as I do with her. I did not experience one single ounce of pain throughout any of the procedures and I felt no pain in the days afterwards. The technology she possesses in her office is revolutionary- a laser machine wherein you do not need a needle to get a filling (GAME CHANGING for those of us afraid of needles), a machine to create your own crown right in front of you so you feel truly at ease and single tooth anesthesia so you’re face doesn’t go numb and only works on the tooth in question.  Outside of this, her little additions to the dentistry room make for the most enjoyable experience: Numbing cream for your gums (she lets you choose the flavor, and stress balls  for us anxious patients to name but two)

Dr Skordeles has truly saved me being away from home. Before I was able to get to her for my root canal she was available to take a phone call out of office hours and prescribe me some pain relief to get me through the pain until my next visit. This however is helped by her amazing administrative assistant Diane who is so bubbly, friendly and attentive and always texts to confirm your appointments. (Helpful for people like me who have forgetful tendencies!)
A special shout out to Alison also, Dr Skordeles’ dentistry assistant who is so lovely and cheerful and does her job so well.

Reading the one negative review on Dr Skordeles’ site makes me so unhappy as I know for sure it can’t be the truth. Trust me when I say she is amazing and you and your pearly whites will not regret choosing her for your next dentist trip. Thank you Dr Skordeles for being the best in the business.

originalText.text: I usually cringe when it comes time to make dentist appointments, and haven't had a consistent one in years. I was not prepared for the wonderful service provided by Dr.Skordeles and Diane. I had the most informative cleaning and left with so much preventative care knowledge. She has the latest technology. I left with whiter teeth just from the cleaning! She explained everything, and I have never felt so taken care of in a dentist's office. I had to have a cavity refilled but-- no needles were used. Instead, she used some sort of laser. I was in and out in no time. Looking forward to regular cleanings from now on.

originalText.text: Dr Skordeles and her assistant Diane were both great to work with - they are both extremely knowledgable and helpful. Dr Skordeles is super friendly and walked me through every second of the dental appointment. The office is comfy and is jam packed with high tech dental machines. She used an x-ray machine that looked straight out of the future and I could actually understand what she was showing me when she walked me through the pictures. Although Dr Skordeles was out of network, both her and Diane were helpful and were able to work with me on pricing. I will definitely be back! PS super convenient office location.
